statements: SELECT * FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, location, temperature FROM IoT_Device_Data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, humidity FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE location = 'Living Room' AND humidity < 50;
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity) FROM IoT_Device_Data;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE device_id = 1
SELECT * FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT device_name, location, temperature FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE location = 'Kitchen' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT device_name, timestamp, temperature FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE humidity BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT device_id, device_name, timestamp FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE temperature < 20 AND location IN ('Living Room', 'Bedroom')
SELECT * FROM IoT_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoT_devices WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT device_id, location FROM IoT_devices ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, sensor_type, installation_date FROM IoT_devices WHERE location LIKE '%room%';
SELECT device_name, location, installation_date FROM IoT_devices WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM IoT_devices;
SELECT device_name, sensor_type FROM IoT_devices WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoT_devices WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature Sensor';
SELECT * FROM Energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, installation_date FROM IoT_devices WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, location_id FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE power_consumption > 100;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM DemandResponseActions WHERE action_type = 'reduce';
SELECT device_id, location_id, last_update FROM IoTDevices WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location_id FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, last_update FROM IoTDevices WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM DemandResponseActions GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT d.device_name, e.power_consumption FROM IoTDevices d JOIN EnergyConsumption e ON d.device_id = e.device_id WHERE e.power_consumption > 100 ORDER BY e.power_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoT_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoT_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, location FROM IoT_devices WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT device_name, location, timestamp FROM IoT_devices WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT response_id, device_id, response_type FROM Demand_response ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoT_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoT_devices WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT device_id, device_name, COUNT(*) AS total FROM IoT_devices GROUP BY device_id, device_name;
SELECT d.device_name, e.power_consumption, p.price FROM IoT_devices d JOIN Energy_consumption e ON d.device_id = e.device_id JOIN Energy_prices p ON e.timestamp = p.timestamp;
SELECT d.device_name, dr.response_type FROM IoT_devices d JOIN Demand_response dr ON d.device_id = dr.device_id WHERE dr.response_type = 'adjustment';
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, status FROM devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, location FROM devices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, location, status FROM devices WHERE location LIKE '%floor%' ORDER BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE location LIKE '%floor%';
SELECT device_name, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' AND sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY device_id HAVING avg_energy > 1000;
